## Getting Started

1.  Create a free [**GitHub**](https://github.com) account
2.  Log in to [**RStudio Cloud**](https://rstudio.cloud/) or [**VSCode.dev**](https://vscode.dev/) using your GitHub account
3.  Familiarize yourself with the [**workshop agenda**](https://jacobkmcpherson.github.io/workshop_pkpd_antimicrobials/#agenda.html)
4.  Interact with this website using [**Discussions**](https://github.com/JacobKMcPherson/workshop_pkpd_antimicrobials/discussions) (bottom of every page)
5.  Take the [**pre-workshop evaluation**](content/pre-workshop-survey.qmd) survey below
